QuestData.Title: Surrender or Else!
QuestData.Description: $n, you and Ace need to march those naga hatchlings down there and use them as leverage to convince the leader of the naga to surrender to us.$B$BAce knows where to go on the south side of the ruins... just follow him.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This is their leader?! Deal with it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deal with the leader of the Naga at the Ruins of Vashj'elan.
QuestData.RewardText: A faceless of the deep? What's that? That does NOT sound like a naga!$B$BWell, you killed it, whatever it was. It doesn't matter now. We have other fish to fry....

Objectives.Objective: Leader of the naga dealt with
